title: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful and spicy chicken curry with coconut milk.
instructions: Fry onions and garlic until golden.
Add chicken and brown it lightly.
Add curry powder and stir well.
Pour in coconut milk, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
